text: @yashar @jaketapper @IlhanMN She is wildly disrespectful of millions of Americans and dishonest as any other Democrat. It's sad that we cannot even trust that she is being honest about the COVID-19 death. Maybe she's lying, maybe shes not but when you cry wolf as much as she does...
